TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResXResourceWriter extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Resources.IResourceWriter
Public Class ResXResourceWriter Implements IDisposable, IResourceWriter
public ref class ResXResourceWriter : IDisposable, System::Resources::IResourceWriter

summary.span: 寫入資源至 XML 資源 (.resx) 檔或輸出資料流。

span.span: Writes resources in an XML resource (.resx) file or an output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 寫入 XML 格式的資源。The writes resources in XML format. 寫入二進位資源檔，請使用。To write a binary resource file, use . 資源會指定為名稱/值組，使用方法。Resources are specified as name/value pairs using the method. 資源名稱會用於查閱; 區分大小寫但是若要更輕鬆地支援撰寫工具，並幫助排除 bug不允許 a.resx 檔案只有大小寫不同的名稱。Resource names are case-sensitive when used for lookups; but to more easily support authoring tools and help eliminate bugs, does not allow a.resx file to have names that vary only by case. 若要建立 a.resx 檔案，建立具有唯一的檔名，呼叫至少一次呼叫，資源檔案寫入磁碟，然後再呼叫關閉該檔案。To create a.resx file, create a with a unique file name, call at least once, call to write the resources file to disk, and then call to close the file. 呼叫會隱含地所需的檔案。Calling will implicitly the file if required. 資源不一定會寫入所新增的順序相同。The resources are not necessarily written in the same order they were added. 多個格式 a.resx 檔案的詳細資訊，請參閱[.resx 檔案以程式設計方式使用](~/docs/framework/resources/working-with-resx-files-programmatically.md)。For more information on the format of a.resx file, see [Working with .resx Files Programmatically](~/docs/framework/resources/working-with-resx-files-programmatically.md). > [!NOTE] > 這個類別包含的連結要求和繼承要求套用到所有成員的類別層級。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A立即呼叫者或衍生的類別並沒有完全信任權限時，會擲回。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. ## Examples 下列範例會建立名為.resx 檔`CarResources.resx`可儲存六個字串、 圖示和兩個應用程式定義的物件 (兩個`Automobile`物件)。The following example creates a .resx file named `CarResources.resx` that stores six strings, an icon, and two application-defined objects (two `Automobile` objects). 請注意，範例中所定義和具現化的 `Automobile` 類別，會標記為 屬性。Note that the `Automobile` class, which is defined and instantiated in the example, is tagged with the attribute. [!code-csharp[conceptual.resources.resx#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.resources.resx/cs/create1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[conceptual.resources.resx#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.resources.resx/vb/create1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 方法會關閉指定做為參數的資料流。The method closes the stream you specify as a parameter. 若要寫入資料流的資源而不用關閉資料流，您必須使用方法。To write the resource to the stream without closing the stream, you must use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立`filename`如果它不存在，而且如果它會覆寫它。This constructor creates `filename` if it does not exist and overwrites it if it does. 如果`filename`包括目錄路徑的完整路徑必須存在，或建構函式會擲回例外狀況。If `filename` includes a directory path, the full path must exist or the constructor throws a exception.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體可將資源寫入指定的資料流物件以及設定轉換器委派。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that writes the resources to a specified stream object and sets a converter delegate.

summary.span: 此委派可讓資源組件使用完整組件名稱，以 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 之前的 .NET Framework 版本為目標來撰寫。

span.span: This delegate enables resource assemblies to be written that target versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] by using qualified assembly names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Visual Studio 和 MSBuild 請建立應用程式版本之前的.NET Framework 為目標的資源時使用這個建構函式[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]。Visual Studio and MSBuild use this constructor when you create resources for an application that target versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資源不會寫入直到呼叫。The resource is not written until is called. 已加入的資源必須可序列化。The resource that was added must be serializable. 如果要新增的資源字串，會寫入做為字串。否則，資源會序列化並儲存在二進位格式。If the resource being added is a string, it is written as a string; otherwise, the resource is serialized and stored in a binary format. ## Examples 下列範例會建立名為.resx 檔`CarResources.resx`可儲存六個字串、 圖示和兩個應用程式定義的物件 (兩個`Automobile`物件)。The following example creates a .resx file named `CarResources.resx` that stores six strings, an icon, and two application-defined objects (two `Automobile` objects). 若要儲存圖示和`Automobile`物件，它會呼叫方法。To store the icon and the `Automobile` objects, it calls the method. 請注意，範例中所定義和具現化的 `Automobile` 類別，會標記為 屬性。Note that the `Automobile` class, which is defined and instantiated in the example, is tagged with the attribute. summary.span: 取得或設定 物件中指定之相對檔案路徑的基底路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the base path for the relative file path specified in a object.

value.span: 路徑，如果在 物件中指定的相對檔案路徑之前加上該路徑，則該路徑會產生 XML 資源檔的絕對路徑。

span.span: A path that, if prepended to the relative file path specified in a object, yields an absolute path to an XML resource file.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫方法，如有必要之前釋出 managed 和 unmanaged 系統資源。The method calls the method, if necessary, before releasing managed and unmanaged system resources. 呼叫允許所使用的系統資源都重新配置用於其他用途。Calling allows the system resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 如需有關，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫方法，如有必要之前釋出 managed 和 unmanaged 系統資源。The method calls the method, if necessary, before releasing managed and unmanaged system resources. 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
For more information about and , see and .

Public Sub Generate ()
public: virtual void Generate();

summary.span: 寫入所有由 方法加入的資源至輸出檔或資料流。

span.span: Writes all resources added by the method to the output file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將資源寫入輸出檔或資料流。The method writes the resources to the output file or stream. 如果您想要寫入的資源，以及接近輸出檔或資料流，呼叫方法。If you want to write the resources as well as close the output file or stream, call the method. 一次呼叫方法。The method can be called only once. 在呼叫方法，所有方法以外將會擲回例外狀況。After calling the method, all methods other than will throw an exception.

span.span: The resource has already been saved.

summary.span: 指定 XML 資源的內容類型。

span.span: Specifies the content type of an XML resource.

summary.span: 此欄位為唯讀。

span.span: This field is read-only.

summary.span: 指定寫入 XML 檔案時使用的結構描述。

span.span: Specifies the schema to use in writing the XML file.

summary.span: 此欄位為唯讀。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構描述會提供有關如何編碼根據要寫入的資源類型的資源詳細資料。The schema provides details on how to encode the resources based on the type of resource being written.
